item.title: Shar add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I haven't any right to criticize books, and I don't do it except when I hate them. I often want to criticize Jane Austen, but her books madden me so that I can't conceal my frenzy from the reader; and therefore I have to stop every time I begin. Every time I read Pride and Prejudice I want to dig her up and beat her over the skull with her own shin-bone." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Shar add a quote by Dashiell Hammett
item.description: "Nora: "How do you feel?" Nick: "Terrible. I must've gone to bed sober." -- Dashiell Hammett

item.title: Shar add a quote by Francesca Lia Block
item.description: "Our eyelashes brushed like they would weave together by themselves, turning us into one wild thing. I say, â€œI think I missed you before I met you even." -- Francesca Lia Block
